name: Dragons Attack! Da Vinci's Revenge!
description:
Take to the skies as a crazed Da Vinci, overwhelmed by magic and anger to strike back at the dragons that destroyed your home! Utilise perfected Da Vinci flying machine parts to mix and max to best suit your play style, and powerful magic abilities to fight off the dragon hoard.

Fly through the skies narrowly dodging dragon breath, while nimbly weaving past and through enemies to take advantage of your greater mobility to hit your enemies where it hurts.

Made in collaboration between Angus Collins (Code Maintainer), Jordan Sparks (Vision Holder), and Jamie Welch (Project Manager) during their study at SAE Creative Media Institute, explore these developers first official release and steps into the games industry.

Made in 12 Weeks from first inspiration to completion and presentation, this project was done for GAD181 - Studio 1.
